name: Dr. Maxim Orlovsky
cooked: Second question: is it possible to request to add a mew tag “client-side-validation”? The topic is general enough and covers more and more tech: OpenTimeStamps, RGB, shielded client-side validation, TapAss - and more to come.
topic_title: Where to post information about new protocol releases?
topic_html_title: Where to post information about new protocol releases?
